mapper.select: SELECT department_code, department_name, display_order, is_active, is_register FROM department_master ORDER BY COALESCE(display_order, 9999), department_code
SELECT department_code, department_name, display_order, is_active, is_register FROM department_master WHERE department_code = #{departmentCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO department_master (department_code, department_name, display_order, is_active, is_register) VALUES (#{departmentCode}, #{departmentName}, #{displayOrder}, COALESCE(#{isActive}, TRUE), COALESCE(#{isRegister}, FALSE)) ON CONFLICT (department_code) DO NOTHING
